/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A few cars and a truck are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
